```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(billboard)
```

```{r, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
x <- wiki_hot_100s |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  mutate(year = parse_number(year))
#fixed year, made it a number 
x
#put this here to view the tibble

```

```{r}
x |> 
  group_by(year) |>
  distinct(artist) |>
  summarize(distinct_artists=n()) |>
  select(year,distinct_artists) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = year,
             y = distinct_artists)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm",
                formula = y ~ x,
                se = FALSE) +
    theme_bw() + 
    labs(title = "Distinct Artists by Year",
         subtitle = "As time increases, the number of distinct artists increases", 
         x = "Year", 
         y = "Number of Distinct Artists") + 
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(1960, 2015, by = 5))

```
